ygData.subject: Re: Leatherskin spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Definately Buy it... then you will love seeing: A Skeletal Monk tries to bash you but your magcal Skin absorbs the blow A Ghoul tries to Bash you but your
ygData.messageBody:
Definately Buy it...

then you will love seeing:

A Skeletal Monk tries to bash you but your magcal Skin absorbs the blow
A Ghoul tries to Bash you but your magical Skin absorbs the blow
A Ghoul tries to Hit you but your magical Skin absorbs the blow

Just keep in mind that the harder the hit the less it lasts!
IE: A green MoB can hit you about 50 times for 1 point of damage per hit.
But a Skeletal monk will take mabe 3 or 4 hits. As I recall it will absorb
about 50 points of damage before it goes away. and it goes up as you level.

Be sure to buy the Bloodstones at your home town...I can get them for about
5 gold 2 silver each.

Auraelle MacFadyen
E'ci

>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>

>Recently made level 24 and was wondering whether or not to buy leatherskin
>spell. Has anyone else found this spell useful? The bloodstone component is
>over 5 gp each, so it can become expensive to use it often.
>
>Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
